snippet.title: Hot Potato Online
snippet.description:
Xbox 360 users can now give back to the community, with the first charity fundraiser on Xbox LIVE Indie Games. All developer proceeds for the Xbox 360 version of Hot Potato Online will benefit Childs Play Charity, established to improve the lives of children with toys and games in over 60 hospitals worldwide.
In Hot Potato Online, players try to explode the opposition with a potato bomb, while attempting to avoid a similar fate themselves. Up to four players or AIs can face off in this fictional sport, in any combination of local or Xbox Live players. Deeply customizable match settings and modes, multiple map themes as well as a custom map editor allow players to fully personalize their frantic experience.
